connect20/nsg_manager.name: connect20/NSG_manager

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/nsg_manager.description:
Norton Shopping Guarantee delivers free protection for shoppers—and smart marketing for retailers. Add it to your website today to increase online conversion (+7%*), repeat buyers (+5%*) and overall customer satisfaction. It’s guaranteed to deliver 20X ROI!
Install now and call 1-855-822-2827 to complete account activation.
